top_comments_top.body:
Some friends and I made a full band cover of "Superman" by Goldfinger.It's the most popular song of the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series and we always wanted to honour this milestone in music and in our youth.

We cover THPS sountracks. We are The Hidden Tape.
